casebody.data:
Roscoe DICKEY, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. SOUTHERN RAILWAY COMPANY, Defendant-Appellee. No. 71-2134

Summary Calendar.*

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Sept. 22, 1971. W. B. Mitchell, Forsyth, Ga., for plaintiff-appellant. Joseph H. Davis, Macon, Ga., for defendant-appellee; Harris, Russell & Watkins, Macon, Ga., of counsel.

Before WISDOM, COLEMAN and SIMPSON, Circuit Judges.

Rule 18, 5 Cir.; See Isbell Enterprises, Inc. v. Citizens Casualty Company of New York et al., 5 Cir. 1970, 431 F.2d 409, Part I.

 PER CURIAM:

Affirmed. See Local Rule 21.1
